Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description: This component was designed by the following creators:
Designs.Title: Designers

Designs.Description:
This component has the following dependencies (arranged in the order from
left-top to right-bottom):
Designs.Title: Dependencies

Designs.Description:
For HTML, ZORALab's Hestia employs the W3C native syntax for simplicity and
maximum compatibility sakes. ZORALab's Hestia recommends the following HTML code
structure for this component.
Designs.Title: HTML

Designs.Code:
<form method='...' action='...'>
	<fieldset>
		<legend>Category Title</legend>
		<fieldset>
			<label>Field 1</label>
			<input ...>
		</fieldset>


		<fieldset>
			<label>Field 2</label>
			<input ...>
		</fieldset>


		...
	</fieldset>

	...
</form>

	id='...INPUT_ID1...'

	autofocus

<!-- ALL PROPERTIES -->

	name="submit[type]"
	value="...AN IDENTIFIABLE VALUE..."
	formaction="...OVERRIDE FORM ACTION..."
	formtype="...OVERRIDE FORM SUBMISSION TYPE..."
	formmethod="...OVERRIDE FORM METHOD (GET|POST|dialog|...)"
	formnovalidate="true"
	formtarget="...AN IFRAME ID..."

/>

Designs.Code:
<!-- MINIMUM (ACCEPTS: 'last.first+nickname@internet.domain' FORMAT) -->
<input type='email'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	pattern='(?![_.-])((?![_.-][_.-])[a-z\d_.-]){0,63}[a-z\d]@((?!-)((?!--)[a-z\d-]){0,63}[a-z\d]\.){1,2}([a-z]{2,14}\.)?[a-z]{2,14}'
	placeholder='...' />


<!-- MINIMUM (ACCEPTS: 'last.first+nickname@local' FORMAT) -->
<input type='email'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	pattern='^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&’*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9-]+(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)*$'
	placeholder='...' />


<!-- MINIMUM (ACCEPTS: LOCKED DOMAIN LIKE 'last.first+nickname@zoralab.com' FORMAT) -->
<input type='email'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	pattern='(?![_.-])((?![_.-][_.-])[a-z\d_.-]){0,63}[a-z\d]@zoralab.com'
	placeholder='...' />


<!-- ALL PROPERTIES -->
<label for='...INPUT-ID1...'>...</label>
<input type="email"
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	value='...'
	pattern='...'
	required
	disabled
	autofocus
	autocomplete
	readonly
	list='...DATALIST_ID1...'
/>
<datalist id='...DATALIST_ID1...'>
	<option value='...' label='...'>
	...
</datalist>

	id='...INPUT-ID1...'

/>

	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	min='0'
	max='100'
	step='0.01'
/>


<!-- ALL PROPERTIES -->

	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	value='...'
	min='0'
	max='100'
	step='0.01'
	required
	disabled
	autofocus

	...
</datalist>

Designs.Title: Number Field HTML

Designs.Code:
<!-- MINIMUM (1 'a-z' and 1 'A-Z'; 1 '0-9'; 1 SYMBOL; 8-16 CHARS) -->
<input type='password'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	pattern='^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[\(!@#\$%\^&\*\)]).{8,16}'
/>


<!-- RECOMMENDED (1 'a-z' and 1 'A-Z'; 1 '0-9'; 1 SYMBOL; >= 33 CHARS) -->
<!-- WHY: ASK USER TO USE PASSWORD BANK LIKE BITWARDEN FOR SAFER COMMUNITY -->
<input type='password'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	pattern='^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[\(!@#\$%\^&\*\)]).{33,}'
	minlength='33'
	placeholder='Password Here'
/>


<!-- ALL PROPERTIES -->
<label for='...INPUT-ID1...'>...</label>
<input type='password'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	pattern='^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[\(!@#\$%\^&\*\)]).{33,}'
	minlength='33'
	maxlength='...'
	placeholder='Password Here'
	required
	disabled
	autofocus
	readonly
/>

<!-- MINIMUM -->
<select id='...INPUT-ID1...' name='...' size='5'>
	<option value='...'>...</option>
	<option value='...'>...</option>
	...
</select>


<!-- MINIMUM (DEFAULT: SELECTED) -->
<select id='...INPUT-ID1...' name='...' size='5'>
	<option value='...' selected>...</option>
	...
</select>


<!-- MINIMUM (MULTIPLE SELECTIONS) -->
<select id='...INPUT-ID1...' name='...' size='5' multiple>
	...
</select>


<!-- RECOMMENDED (USE OPTGROUP) -->
<select id='...INPUT-ID1...' name='...' size='5'>
	<optgroup label='...'>
		<option value='...'>...</option>
		<option value='...'>...</option>
		...
	</optgroup>


	<optgroup label='...'>
		<option value='...'>...</option>
		<option value='...'>...</option>
		...
	</optgroup>


	...
</select>


<!-- ALL PROPERTIES -->
<select id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	autocomplete
	multiple
	required
	disabled
	autofocus
	size='...DISPLAY SIZE...'
>
	<optgroup label='...'>
		<option value='...' selected>...</option>

		...
	</optgroup>

	...
</select>

Designs.Title: Time Field HTML

Designs.Code:
<!-- MINIMUM -->
<input type='url'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	placeholder='...'
	pattern='...' />


<!-- MINIMUM (HTTPS ONLY) -->
<input type='url'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	placeholder='...'
	pattern='(https)(:\/\/)([a-zA-Z]?)(([^.]+)\.)?([a-zA-z0-9\-_]+)(.*)?(\/[^\s]*)?' />


<!-- MINIMUM (HTTP/HTTPS ONLY) -->
<input type='url'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	placeholder='...'
	pattern='(http(s?))(:\/\/)([a-zA-Z]?)(([^.]+)\.)?([a-zA-z0-9\-_]+)(.*)?(\/[^\s]*)?' />


<!-- MINIMUM (TEL ONLY - 'tel:+XXXX...' OR 'tel:00XXXX...' ) -->
<input type='url'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	placeholder='...'
	pattern='(tel)(:\/\/)(\+?)([0-9\-_]+)' />


<!-- MINIMUM (EMAIL ONLY - 'mailto://xxx@internet.domain' OR 'mailto://xxx@local') -->
<input type='url'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	placeholder='...'
	pattern='(mailto)(:\/\/)([a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&’*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+)@([a-zA-Z0-9-]+(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)*)' />


<!-- ALL PROPERTIES -->
<input type='url'
	id='...INPUT-ID1...'
	name='...'
	pattern='...'
	placeholder='...'
	value='...'
	minlength='...'
	maxlength='...'
	spellcheck
	required
	disabled
	autofocus
	autocomplete
	readonly
	list='...datalist-ID1...'
/>
<datalist id='...datalist-ID1...'>
	<option value='...' label='...' />
</datalist>

<!-- MINIMUM -->

	id='...'
	name='...'
	pattern='(?:^\d*\-W(?:([0-4][0-9])|5[0-2]))'
	placeholder='YYYY-Wnn'
/>


<!-- RECOMMENDED -->
<!-- Don't use it. Use 'date' instead. Firefox is not ready. -->


<!-- ALL PROPERTIES -->
<input type='week'
	id='...'
	name='...'
	pattern='(?:^\d*\-W(?:([0-4][0-9])|5[0-2]))'
	placeholder='YYYY-Wnn'
	value='...'
	min='...'
	max='...'
	required
	disabled
	autofocus
	autocomplete
	readonly
	list='...datalist-ID1...'
/>
<datalist id='...datalist-ID1...'>
	<option value='...' label='...' />
	...
</datalist>

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 2rem auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : .5rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-toggle-spacing
CSS PROPERTY : column-gap
DEFAULT      : 1rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the toggle spacing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Toggle Spacing

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-min-width
CSS PROPERTY : min-width
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the minimum width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Min-Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-width
CSS PROPERTY : width
DEFAULT      : auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-max-width
CSS PROPERTY : max-width
DEFAULT      : 100% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the maximum width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Max-Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-min-height
CSS PROPERTY : min-height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the minimum height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Min-Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-height
CSS PROPERTY : height
DEFAULT      : auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-max-height
CSS PROPERTY : max-height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the maximum height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Max-Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-color-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-inverted) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component while in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Inverted)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-color-primary
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-400) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the primary color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color (Primary)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-color-primary-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-300) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the primary color of the rendered component while in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Primary + Inverted)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-color-valid
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-indicator-green) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the valid value's color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color (Valid)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --form-color-invalid
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-indicator-red) (>= v1.2.0)

Designs.Code:

Functions.Description: Render the CSS output for this UI component.
Functions.Title: ToCSS

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for form values.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package was known as 'form_hestiaUI' before ZORALab's Hestia 'v1.2.0'. The
transformation was due to someone attempting to steal the design copyrights and
makes way for programming package's documentation restructuring.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Legacy Recording

Title: zoralabFORM Technical Specification - ZORALab's Hestia
